about_the_game:
Game Background Brief:
Get ready for an epic Mars survival challenge! In "Red Planet Rampart," an immersive sci-fi survival role play game, you are deployed to the desolate red planet to reforge humanity's hope. With no hospitable atmosphere, no nurturing water sources, only relentless storms, unknown alien creatures, and the remnants of ancient Martian civilizations, you must use wit and determination to survive on this alien land and build a Mars base of your own. Now, forge your legend and start your Martian era.



Game Highlights:

Innovative Survival Building - Utilize terrain transformation technology and underground construction strategies to build your invincible Mars stronghold.
Guard and Combat - Set up high-tech defenses, forge weapons, cultivate crops, and fight for every inch of land against the incursion of alien civilizations.
Exploration and Discovery - Integrate role-playing adventure elements, free flight, and challenging players to bravely uncover the secrets of Mars, from ancient ruins to floating islands, each step filled with surprises and danger.


Detailed Description:

I. Survival Building Strategy:
Beneath the dusty red skies, dig out your refuge, laboratory, and production base. "Red Planet Rampart" offers a unique terrain-shaping experience. Use advanced tools to create and expand your subterranean realm; this will be your space for scientific research, rest, and strategic planning. The surface may be stormy, but beneath is your safety fortress, the starting point of your Martian dream.



II. Defending the Martian Base:
Time to activate the defense protocols! Build defensive turrets, lay out traps, use nuclear fusion for a robust energy supply, and protect your base from cosmic titanic foes. Each alien attack is a test of the fortifications, your survival intelligence will elevate during the confrontation with alien civilizations. Only the toughest and smartest operation can stand in this stellar war.



At the same time, you can grow your own crops underground, and use new technologies to extract water from deep beneath the Martian surface, which is used to maintain the operation and survival of the base.



III. Mysteries of Mars Exploration:
Suit up and prepare to explore the forgotten relics on Mars. Floating islands in the sky, volcanic pools, and mysterious underground buildings hold secrets and millennia-old technology of ancient civilizations. But beware those guardians; they are cruel, powerful, and unwilling to share the secrets of Mars. Your courage and wit will be your greatest weapons.



"Red Planet Rampart" is a game not to be missed. Dive into this harsh yet fascinating red world now, and commence your journey to dominate Mars. Every choice, every battle, it's more than survival—it's about creating a legacy on the Red Planet. Are you ready to face the Martian frontier?

name: Red Planet Rampart

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i9 13900
  • Memory: 64 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080 10G
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: You are deployed to the desolate red planet to reforge humanity's hope. With no hospitable atmosphere, no nurturing water sources, only relentless storms, unknown alien creatures, you must use wit and determination to survive on this alien land and build a Mars base of your own.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
